com.netflix.spectator.api

Interface Registry

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Iterable<Meter>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractRegistry, DefaultRegistry, ExtendedRegistry, NoopRegistry

    public interface Registry
extends Iterable<Meter>
    Registry to manage a set of meters.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addListener(RegistryListener listener)
      Add a listener that will get notified whenever a meter is added into the registry.
      Clock clock()
      The clock used by the registry for timing events.
      Counter counter(Id id)
      Measures the rate of some activity.
      Id createId(String name)
      Creates an identifier for a meter.
      Id createId(String name, Iterable<Tag> tags)
      Creates an identifier for a meter.
      DistributionSummary distributionSummary(Id id)
      Measures the rate and variation in amount for some activity.
      Meter get(Id id)
      Returns the meter associated with a given id.
      Iterator<Meter> iterator()
      Iterator for traversing the set of meters in the registry.
      void register(Meter meter)
      Add a custom meter to the registry.
      void removeListener(RegistryListener listener)
      Remove a listener from the registry.
      Timer timer(Id id)
      Measures the rate and time taken for short running tasks.

    • Method Detail

      • clock

        Clock clock()
        The clock used by the registry for timing events.

      • createId

        Id createId(String name)
        Creates an identifier for a meter. All ids passed into other calls should be created by the registry.
        Parameters:
        name - Description of the measurement that is being collected.

      • createId

        Id createId(String name,
          Iterable<Tag> tags)
        Creates an identifier for a meter. All ids passed into other calls should be created by the registry.
        Parameters:
        name - Description of the measurement that is being collected.
        tags - Other dimensions that can be used to classify the measurement.

      • register

        void register(Meter meter)
        Add a custom meter to the registry.

      • counter

        Counter counter(Id id)
        Measures the rate of some activity. A counter is for continuously incrementing sources like the number of requests that are coming into a server.
        Parameters:
        id - Identifier created by a call to createId(java.lang.String)

      • distributionSummary

        DistributionSummary distributionSummary(Id id)
        Measures the rate and variation in amount for some activity. For example, it could be used to get insight into the variation in response sizes for requests to a server.
        Parameters:
        id - Identifier created by a call to createId(java.lang.String)

      • timer

        Timer timer(Id id)
        Measures the rate and time taken for short running tasks.
        Parameters:
        id - Identifier created by a call to createId(java.lang.String)

      • get

        Meter get(Id id)
        Returns the meter associated with a given id.
        Parameters:
        id - Identifier for the meter.
        Returns:
        Instance of the meter or null if there is no match.

      • iterator

        Iterator<Meter> iterator()
        Iterator for traversing the set of meters in the registry.
        Specified by:
        iterator in interface Iterable<Meter>

      • addListener

        void addListener(RegistryListener listener)
        Add a listener that will get notified whenever a meter is added into the registry.

      • removeListener

        void removeListener(RegistryListener listener)
        Remove a listener from the registry.
